about_the_game:
Discover the ultimate companion to 3 Minutes to Midnight with this 121-page Adventurer’s Guide. Packed with everything you need to fully master the game. Whether you’re stuck on a tricky puzzle or seeking every hidden detail, this comprehensive guide has you covered.

What’s Inside:

⭐ Detailed Walkthroughs: Navigate every chapter with step-by-step solutions to puzzles.

⭐ Hints and Tips: Subtle suggestions and hints designed to guide you without giving it all away.

⭐ Achievements: Unlock all achievements with detailed steps and strategies.

⭐ Endings Explained: Unravel the different endings with thorough explanations and how to achieve them.

⭐ References: Discover hidden references to beloved movies, books, and pop culture, woven seamlessly into your journey.

 Available in PDF format.
